website_summaries.verdict: Made partially from recycled materials, these bright animal designs are fun and eco-friendly.
pros: Watercolor animal designs are unique and fun
Front of cards has a high-gloss finish
Blank interior leaves lots of space for your own greeting
Cards are made with 30% recycled materials
cons: A bright red stripe runs along the backside of the card

customer_reviews.title: Holiday pups to send some cheer
customer_reviews.text: These cards are so cute! They are nice thick cards with very creative images on them. I ordered multiple packs to make sure that I could send one to everyone on my list and they didn't disappoint. It would be nice to be able to get a mixed cat and dog, or multi animal set with these illustrations on them (for all of the animal lovers who have loves other than the canine kind), but I would definitely order these again next year. Plus, it's nice to be able to support a smaller company with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NByrnes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful image and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My family enjoyed getting them it sparked some memories for my grandmother and my mother, who remember getting cards with similar images! I would order these again, the only thing I could say negative is the card is printed in a thick high gloss card stock...but that didn't hurt the card what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G

customer_reviews.title: these cards are so cute
customer_reviews.text: I brought these cards and loved them so much, I purchased a second set. they are great as Christmas cards and I also used some of them as Thank you cards for Christmas gifts received. I will purchase them again next year!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C. Barry

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute.
customer_reviews.text: They are made on sturdy paper, and the prints are clear and of good quality. Each one is cuter than the last and are going to make great Xmas cards. A lot of my friends and family are animal lovers, so I think they will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: "Would get one more star if I had received 10 cards instead of 9. Deer is missing"... After I posted this review the seller did something amazing. They sent me a whole new pack of cards. I am very grateful for this kind gesture. Cards btw are beautiful. The design is watercolor but the feel and look is a good quality glossy card.
customer_reviews.author: Cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I am not someone who sends a million Christmas cards, and when my family opens them they are usually all together. I wanted everyone to get a unique card and this pack was perfect. There seemed to be a perfect animal for every person. The cards were a very nice quality. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Poetry in Branches and Ice....
customer_reviews.text: Do you love to look at trees, branches and grasses when they are dusted with snow or encased in ice? You'll love these cards. They are all little, poem-like snaps and bits of nature. My only complaint is that the blues and whites are a little cold looking, but folks, they're all about ice! May I'll save some to send in summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little Christmas card.
customer_reviews.text: Cards made well and cute as can be. I like to write my own message and these are perfect for that. Cards are blank inside. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: I winner!
customer_reviews.text: These little cards are the perfect size for sending a quick note to the grand kids. Yes, I mail cards to my little loves. They get so excited to receive their own mail. And even though these cards seem "Christmasy' they are so darn cute that they really can be used anytime. I am very happy with the quality of the cards and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Love these cards!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are a real find! Beautifully made with vivid colors! Excellent quality! I’m looking forward to sending these! Also, very nicely packaged! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These cards are absolutely adorable. They are of a good quality & even had a graphic on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Great quality. Minor nit picks: there is a red bar of color, about 1/4" in size, that runs along the back with the name of the card company on it. The logo is fine, but I wish that red bar wasnt there. Detracts from the card. Second nit pick is the deer head. Why does it have to look so moldy and like it's decomposing? Wish the colors were a bit different since that is my favorite design.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Little Cards
customer_reviews.text: Great little beautifully designed Christmas cards. Ordered 2 of these and one of the frogs and will order again if I run out. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: GARY EMES

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cards for the price. I would buy them again. Every comments (positively) on the images!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, everyone loves these. There's a bright red stripe on the back of the card I'm not crazy about but that doesn't really hurt anything. The cards are on nice paper. Decent quality images. Nothing super fancy but great for the price. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd seen your cards before I ordered my regular cards. They are darling and just suited for so many situations.. I will look for your cards from now on. These cards will carry my thank you notes from Christmas. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Garrett

customer_reviews.title: A true feel from the past
customer_reviews.text: I loved growing up with cards and decorations like these. The cards are not just a picture with glossy/flashy finish. The original look was more subtle and these cards capture it. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyhf

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These awesome cards were a last minute save from Christmas disaster! In addition to being super cute, the quality of these cards is unbelieveable. Now that I know about this company, I will be looking for their peoducts sooner next year.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: perfect size (4 x 5) holiday cards!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful cards to send for the holidays. Each animal has an adorable 'santa hat' on their head.
customer_reviews.author: azjane

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for the Holidays!
customer_reviews.text: These cards were an absolute delight! I had to wait a few days to receive them due to high demand, but they were WORTH THE WAIT! You get one of each card depicted. They are great, durable quality, and have a boutique-feel. I had gone to Target and Papyrus in search of cards, but wanted something with a little bit more "Je Ne Sais Quois" - and these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: very cute animal images, my family loved receiving them with their holiday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: kichi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Greetings
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mini cards. Ok to mail. Great variety. High quality cardstock.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: I love these whimsical Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: I love these whimsical Christmas cards. There are 10 different animals donning Santa hats. The inside is blank, so I will be able to write appropriate messages for individual friend/family. The quality of the paper product is nice. If you are looking for a some fun Holiday cards to send, I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Lone Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cards. A little pixelated. Could be a cuter Santa face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my coworkers this Holiday season and they were a perfect selection. The quality was all around 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these cards for my coworkers this Holiday season and they were a perfect selection. The quality was all around 5 stars... I'm not a "typical" holiday card kind of girl and these cards represented me (cute graphics and colors) and allowed me to write my own personal holiday message. Definitely will look into purchasing my next set of cards from this company. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cards
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some blank-inside cards with some universally accepted art on the front and these fit the bill perfectly. The images are cute and funny. And, the cards are made from a good quality cardstock. Thank you for a great item!
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards. Glossy paper. They look exactly as they do in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: spabis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, very high quality cards!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful cards on heavy paper. I like too that on the inside there is a faint continued image that you can write over, but adds a lovely touch to the inside of the cards. VERY happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable cards to use as place cards and or gift card holders The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet lovers!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! Ordered the pups and then went back for the kittens. Hoping they'll have new ones next year!
customer_reviews.author: kates

customer_reviews.title: Great Renderings of "Holiday Wildlife"
customer_reviews.text: The amusing, and ultra-realistic artistry on the cards, renders them a superb card to accompany any gift - or, they are great as a stand-alone greeting card! Well worth the buy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great Greetings
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely cards! The colors are vibrant and suitable for the holidays without being garish. I recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: Pierrot

customer_reviews.title: great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Quality paper, great price. Will really enjoy sending these. Will definitely do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, small cards
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, small cards. Blank inside. Come in a plastic box and arrived undamaged. The Giraffe is my favorite with 2 tiny hats on!
customer_reviews.author: rainbowdolph

customer_reviews.title: I love frogs and these were adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love frogs and these were adorable! They are small, but large enough to send in the mail. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Fossil

customer_reviews.title: Cute and unique
customer_reviews.text: Cute cards, I bought them for their uniqueness. Glossy exterior, blank inside. Quality of image is great! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable cards that were a big hit at our work holiday party. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cards. I liked them so much that I decided to order more!
customer_reviews.author: D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Cards as expected, good online description and color photos match actual colors. All variety on cards represented in online images. Really nice packaging; cards well protected. Will order from NobleWorks again.
customer_reviews.author: amanda77kr

customer_reviews.title: These note cards are adorable! Love the whimsy for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: These note cards are adorable! Love the whimsy for the holidays. The paper quality is what I expected, as well. I would order more cards from this company!
customer_reviews.author: dilolli

customer_reviews.title: Super cute cards!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to give to my son's preschool teachers and bus drivers. They're really cute and are on a nice, thick card stock. Perfect size to put gift cards in!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dultz

customer_reviews.title: The Best Card Company Holiday Dogs- NobleWorks
customer_reviews.text: These cards are so darn cute!! The friends and family members I sent them to just loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Burns

customer_reviews.title: These worked out perfect. We never get around to sending Christmas cards ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked out perfect. We never get around to sending Christmas cards so this year we sent out Leap Day cards... with both the frog and the Santa hats it tied it all together... I think any way! Yes would order again
customer_reviews.author: DavidS

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and different
customer_reviews.text: These cards are well made and out of the ordinary. The designs are clever and whimsical. They were slightly smaller than I expected but that doesn't detract from their charm. Love that they are made in America.
customer_reviews.author: 2RidePegasus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the selection, I got to choose one for each person based on personality. Small and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dini Vo

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. They came right on time
customer_reviews.text: Just right size and price for my needs. I really like them. They came right on time....
customer_reviews.author: Leslee B.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I LOVE them! I love that there is a surprise little kitty inside the card as well; such an unique little treat!! I have two gray tabbies that look just like gray tabby on one of the cards.... that was my favorite to give away!!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cards
customer_reviews.text: I received the cards this week and I am very pleased with the product. The pictures are true and are perfect to use for people I work with.

customer_reviews.title: OLD FASHIONED SANTA SCENES....
customer_reviews.text: NICE VARIETY OF SANTA SCENES. I LIKE THAT THE CARDS ARE BLANK SO I CAN WRITE MY OWN SENTIMENT.
customer_reviews.author: DAWNWANDERS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards, very good quality printing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards, very good quality printing...love them! Excellent value. These work great for sending notes to friends or to customers, which is what I use them for- as "thank you" notes!

customer_reviews.title: Cards are whimsical and perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift and exactly what they will want. They are cute and perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! Perfect antedote for boring old Christmas cards!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - nice, painted graphics that are humorous and fun.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small
customer_reviews.text: Got these to write a small note to each of my employees, since we work in a zoo they were perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: We love our wildlife expressions holiday cards - beautifully expressive animals to help send merry greetings. Very fun to send these to friends and family. Thanks, and hope I can get them next year!

product_meta.title: Wildlife Expressions - 10 Watercolor Christmas & Holiday Cards with Envelopes (4 x 5.12 Inch) - Blank Note Card Assortment for Kids, Adults M2973XSB
feature_bullets: #1 WATERCOLOR CHRISTMAS CARDS - Each card is blank, with no greeting inside, so you may personalize each card to say seasons greetings during the holidays, Christmas, and the New Year! Our humorous animal cards capture the holiday spirit and feature a squirrel, cow, bird, and more! Each beautiful and watercolor design is fun, exciting, and will instantly capture the attention of kids and adults. There's no better way to wish a Merry Christmas than with watercolored animals in Santa hats!

4 x 5.12 Inch NOTE CARDS WITH ENVELOPES - Colorful, wacky, & cute describe our popular set of xmas note cards! Personalize our cards with your own loving & thoughtful sentiments to family & friends. Smaller than a 5x7, our (4 x 5.12 Inch ) assortment of greeting cards is easily stored at home or work and ship in a reusable box. NobleWorks carries a wide range of designs and art styles, offering a unique match for men and women looking for the right notecard for their special, personal message.

SPREAD HOLIDAY CHEER - Whether writing about your fun and enjoyable year, updating family about the kid's activities, or simply wishing everyone a Merry Christmas, this assortment of small note cards are the perfect gift. A joyful giraffe, rabbit, frog, or panda bear will brighten anyone's day! A variety of the art and designs on our mini note cards even look great framed! Try framing them individually, or grouping several in a collage frame, to create visually appealing wall decor.

ABOUT THE CARD - Keeping US jobs at home, most of our products are Made in the USA (and Canada) for almost 40 years. We use premium, thick, snow white cardstock, w/ 30% recycled content plus FSC’s (Forest Stewardship Council) responsibly forested renewable resources certified pulp (no papyrus, naturally). Print on demand technology reduces waste and further minimizes environmental impact.

ABOUT US - Founded in 1980, NobleWorks - and The Best Card Company, its non humor division - is an award winning brand. We’re an American based, family owned stationery publisher. A proud board member of the Greeting Card Association, we strive for 100% perfection and customer satisfaction - every card, every order, every time. We are here to serve whether you purchased our fold over stationary note cards directly from us or from authorized resellers.
